name: Golmana
description: The Golmana is a Medium demon with a sturdy build, featuring sharp claws and a tail for vicious attacks, capable of climbing difficult surfaces effortlessly.
memorable: Its Void Screech ability, which combines necrotic and thunder damage, creates an imposing threat on non-fiends.
goals: To overpower enemies with physical and magical prowess while sustaining its own health.
relations: May be encountered alongside other demons or fiends, often serving as enforcers in dark schemes.
environment: Typically found in infernal realms or corrupted lands, thriving in hostile environments.
strengths: Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage; immune to poison; has excellent stealth and hearing.
weaknesses: Below-average intelligence, leading to potential strategic shortcomings.
attacks: Utilizes claw attacks for slashing damage and a long-reaching tail strike
most_powerful_ability: Void Screech, a cone attack causing significant necrotic and thunder damage, with added disadvantage on the next attack for affected targets.
senses: Has heightened hearing, allowing it to perceive sounds with a score of 19.
skills: Possesses high skills in Stealth and Perception, making it hard to detect.
additional_information: Grapples and restrains smaller enemies with its claws.
Regains health when using the Consuming Rend ability.
Advantage on saving throws against magical effects due to Magic Resistance.
Heightened awareness makes it difficult to surprise.
test_queries: demon with void powers and supernatural climbing
formidable fiend immune to poison damage
highly perceptive demon with magical resistance
monster that grapples and drains health
menacing creature capable of necrotic damage
